title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in a dynamic text item is different from the format displayed in a data/text item.
OB: The datetime values displayed in the dynamic text item are in a different format compared to the datetime values displayed in the data/text item.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a text, data, or dynamic text item in a form. 
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item. 
3. Compare the format of the datetime values displayed in the two items.
